Package com.cezar.homework.w03

Class SalesRepresentative

java.lang.Object
com.cezar.homework.w03.SalesRepresentative
public class SalesRepresentative
extends java.lang.Object
Defining the properties of the sales representatives. Each sales person has a total revenue of his/her sales. Each sale made by a seller it is stored in a list of his/her sales.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SalesRepresentative()
    Default constructor.
    SalesRepresentative​(java.lang.String name)
    Create a new seller with a name.

  • Method Summary

    Get the @name of the seller.
    int getRevenue()
    Get the total revenue of a sales rep.
    void sell​(int value)
    After each sell of a seller add it to his/her total sales and store it in a list of sales.
